newsitem.title: UK: ICI up as Merrill raises long-term rating.
newsitem.headline: ICI up as Merrill raises long-term rating.

text.p: Shares in Imperial Chemical Industries Plc rose on Friday as analysts at Merrill Lynch raised their long-term rating on the stock to "accumulate" from "neutral," market sources said.
The stock was up 9p at 794-1/2 by 1345 GMT -- near its five-month high of 802p set on May 13 -- in volume of 1.4 million shares.

Sources said the Merrill upgrade reflected a positive view on the company's recently-announced plan to acquire the speciality chemical operations of Unilever Plc. Analysts at the brokerage were not immediately available for comment.
